Label.TooltipReference: Hit Points
Mana
Endurance
Determines how well you mitigate incoming damage
Mitigation: Chance to take less melee damage
Evasion: Chance to avoid melee damage
Adds to your ability to make a successful melee attack
Offense: Chance to deal more damage
Accuracy: Chance to land a hit
Shows the speed at which you attack - the base is 100%
Determines your encumberance limit and is a factor in melee damage
Influences your hit point and endurance totals
Determines your mana (for some classes) and influences your chance to raise skills
Determines your mana (for some classes) and influences your chance to raise skills
Influences your AC and helps you avoid incoming damage
Influences success to make a successful attack, damage done, and chance to skill up
Influences pricing on many vendors and influences success of charm and memorization spells
The number of hit points you will regenerate while in combat
The number of mana points you will regenerate while in combat
The number of endurance points you will regenerate while in combat
Adds to the effectiveness of your healing spells
Adds to the effectiveness of your damage spells

Button.TooltipReference: Set the mercenary's owner based on your current target.
Show info about your current mercenary.
Set a hotkey to switch to the currently selected mercenary.
Opens the Marketplace window to allow for purchase of additional slot(s).

Label.TooltipReference: This is total number of mercenary slots that you currently have.

Button.TooltipReference: Opens the mercenary switch popup window.
Toggle whether your mercenary automatically assists.
For tank mercenaries opens up valid NPCs on the group enemy list as targets. For healer mercenaries, overrides the range restrictions on healing pullers for 3 seconds.
Set the currently selected stance as the active stance.
Set a hotkey to switch to the currently selected stance.
Opens the SparxxUI Mercenary Inventory window.
